description: Slow cooker shepherd's pie is well worth the wait for a rich and tender slow braised filling.
name: Slow Cooker Shepherd's Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium onions, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the onions, thyme and carrots for 5 minutes, stirring. Stir in the garlic and mince and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the tomato puree, flour and Worchester sauce and cook for 1 minute. Tip the mix into the slow cooker with a dash of water.
Cook the potatoes in a large pot of boiling water for 8-10 minutes, until tender. Drain well, mash to a coarse mix and stir in the creme fraiche.
Smooth the mash on top of the mince in the slow cooker, place the lid on and cook on low for 5 hours, until bubbling at the sides.
